structure.unit: Real And Personal Property And Domestic Relations
The Land Court And Registration Of Title To Land

law.catch_line: Reference To Examiner To Search Records And Investigate Facts; Report; Notice Of Report To Plaintiff
law.text: Immediately after the filing of a complaint, the court shall enter an order referring it to one of the examiners of title, who shall search the records and investigate all facts stated in the complaint or otherwise brought to his notice, and shall file in the case a report thereon, concluding with a certificate of his opinion upon the title. The recorder shall give notice to the plaintiff of the filing of such report.
